item.title: On Pivoting
item.description: After 3 spirited months of grinding my co-founder Nick and I have decided to pivot. In September we were accepted into the South Park Commons Founder Fellowship and our journey started. We had a lot of ideas but after stack ranking them according to founder-market fit, technical risk, and market risk, we went with our AI Observability idea. The plan was to sprint on the idea for 3 months and see if we could hit the goals that we set.
